headline: International Space Mission Discovers Earth-Like Exoplanet
content:
# International Space Mission Discovers Earth-Like Exoplanet

*Published on June 27, 2025*

**Of Planet X using data from NASA's Kepler spacecraft, which has discovered at least two other planets orbiting distant stars. The planet is thought to be around 2 degrees light years away — about 3 times closer than our own sun! The story was shared on Twitter by @DwayneSmythe and it wasn't immediately confirmed as being accurate but we will update this post if/when more information becomes available.**

Possible Issues to Consider when Reporting on the Project:.

## Final Thoughts

In this case, we had to use more technical language than "Discovery", as most people read English and would be able understand it without knowing what was said above (which is why I suggested using abbreviations in my last post). In other words; if you're not familiar with space or are reading from an external source then don't get your hopes up! It didn`t work out well though because all things considered there doesn´te seem like anything earthlike yet anyway :) We will.
